Package net.minestom.server.utils.thread

Class ThreadBindingExecutor

java.lang.Object
java.util.concurrent.AbstractExecutorService
net.minestom.server.utils.thread.ThreadBindingExecutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Executor, ExecutorService
public class ThreadBindingExecutor extends AbstractExecutorService
Executor service which will always give the same thread to a given Runnable. Uses 
Runnable#hashCode()
to determine the thread to assign.

  • Constructor Details

    • ThreadBindingExecutor

      public ThreadBindingExecutor(int nThreads, String name)
      Creates a non-local thread-binding executor
      Parameters:
      nThreads - the number of threads
      name - the name of the thread pool

    • ThreadBindingExecutor

      public ThreadBindingExecutor(int nThreads, String name, boolean local)
      Parameters:
      nThreads - the number of threads
      name - the name of the thread pool
      local - set to true if this executor is only used inside a method and should *not* be kept in the internal list of executors
